Troubleshooting of technical related issues and ensure to resolve the issues or queries over the call. Research, diagnose, troubleshoot and identify solutions to resolve customer issues Candidate should be flexible to work in 24*7 environments (Rotational Shift), comfortable to work in night shifts. 5 days working. Transportation Facilities: Both way Interview Date : 27th to 29th Jun 2019 Timing : 11 AM - 5 PM Venue Details : Tech Mahindra Limited, A20 (Basement) Sector 60 Noida Documents required for walk-in: Copy of CV Original ID proof (Aadhaar - Mandate) Contact Person: Prachi Tiwari
